reviewText: Boring. At the beginning, it is like you lister to someone reading a pdf or word document to you. Some resume tips is outdated. This course should be provided for FREE, including certificate of copletion. Going to YouTube and find the one in your field about the same topics is to save your time and being updated with what you need to get a job in the filed of your interest.
Useless if you already are a worker.
Very short access to the course but the explanations are very helpfull.
Person taking too fast
Very basic. Only useful for those you have no experience.
The course is helpful, but the peer-graded assignment is a joke.
Course material is outdated and learning is very little.

The course was not up to the expectations. Most of the information are repeated and not new. I expected to get something unique and valuable practical information that I can jump on it to start but that did not happen. I appreciate the facts , numbers and percentages mentioned but its not enough. I've passed the course successfully and got few info to be honest but when I started I was expecting much much more. Thanks to the crew and to university for their effort.

Pros: The Job Success course material was helpful with emphasizing the importance of your overall social presence on varying social media platoforms. It also provided insight on how employers view you based on your personal or professional profiles. An added bonus was the insight provided regarding digital marketing and how it relates to effective ways to promote your brand or "sell yourself".Cons: 1. There were SEVERAL links to important files that DID NOT WORK and no one helped nor responded maing them accessible to students.2. Paying for the certificate yet having to WAIT for someone else to review your assignment in order to reeive your certificate REGARDLESS of your hard work or payment to receive certificate. Peer-reviewd assignments are   an insult when there are no other srudents taking the course or finising the course. SO your finished work can just sit there until someeone else comes along to releaase your certificate.3. No one available to respond to your concerns or questions.***Overall, this course would have been GREAT if:- all the links worked, -it wsn't peer-reviewed-if there was someone occasionally monitirng the course for replies.
Good, but outdated

the course is generally good, but it's adequate for those who has just graduate and didn't do any internship before. however, I enjoyed listening to some tips especially those related to social media and networking
Worth doing just to begin thinking about refresh for new job search.
Nicely illustrated course, but the title is way misleading.
One of the best courses I took on Coursera. The best part is evaluation in this course.

I was unable to view the different resumes thru google , however I was able to continue the course and taken in the information.   Overall, I enjoyed this course and hope to get a new job soon.Tanya Williams
g

3.5This course helped me gain a different perspective on the new hiring process. Some of the concepts have gone obsolete though (Google+) but it did not affect the general idea conveyed.Some reference materials are inaccessible.
concrete tips to follow

T​his could have been a single week course - there is a similar version of this course on LinkedIn Learning that offers it in 1 hour.  Perhaps there was too much focus on Social Media? I am not sure how many recruiters actually look at people's social media profiles other than on LinkedIn, unless the job description requires social media interaction (e.g. community manager, social media manager). O​therwise, there was good content in there.
I appreciate the easy flow and the instructions.  They were particularly beneficial in instruction on infographic resumes.  Thank you.
A​ course with a good reminder that one needs to have a goal orientated introduction ready and an updated relevant presence on Linkedin
very informative.  I had no idea about infographic resume styles.  Thanks for the information regards!

The content was informative and useful. The only negative is the link to the templates for week 2 is no longer working. Since this is a recurring course my suggestion is to open up the link. It could be place in a folder that students make a copy of for the use. The promise of a template that was not forthcoming was disappointing.
Very enlightening and useful for learning
It was very interesting

This course was great. The only problem is the first speaker who really talks too fast. She is truly on nerve. I would rather to read the material myself than listening to her. She was awful and take a star away off of the course.
Very helpful course but sadly I completed it, passed and didn't receive the certificate ☹

Showed me good practices and ideas how to improve my chances. I also found useful the thought that I do not need to accept everything from the employee than I need to find a job with is good enough for me as well.

Some good material, and you can do the course tasks without paying, so that's good. Seems to cover some essential helpful points, and I did learn a bit on how to promote myself better, but may be a bit on the short and simple side of things. Still recommended though.
Kind of short. Could have elaborated on some things. Also, having some recruitment experience myself, this might be different in several countries.
Good one .. Especially for fresh grads, they'll get an idea about how to build their social image and resume so they stand out from rest of the candidates.
interesting and great experience
Great course, very insightful and helpful. I would encourage anyone seeking to get promoted to take this course. The course may be completed in approximately 5hrs or less if you dedicate the time.

Most people tend to underestimate these courses, but the material provided was very helpful. I didn't consider the course at first, but after researching some stats, everyone who wants to move up in their careers should know a few tricks to stay ahead of the rest of their job competition.

Very helpful course. I definitely now understand the importance of having an infographic resume and how much it matters to write down carefully my professional pitch.

I think the course was very good and challenging. If you are looking for a job or new career or maybe have been away from professional career for some time, this is a great course to get informed about what employers are looking for and where employers might look to find information (good or bad) about you online. Step 1 was how to update social media and maximize your value on social media. I got some great tips from this step. Step 2 was resumes and what types of resumes there are and when one may be better than another. The resume step was interesting and used some types of resumes that were new to me. Step 3 was the professional pitch! I loved this exercise! I would like to state at first I thought how am I gong to write this? I am currently unemployed. I had to get creative. I feel that I will definitely be using my pitch soon. This course is what you make of it - if you work on it hopefully, you and I will all get a job or promotion we want. Thank you!
excellent
Excellent to improve yourself and your own presentation! Thank you so much!
very helpful and informative in building a good resume and profile online for job search

I have gained great insight on making my digital presence to be professional and consistent, and gaining confidence in marketing myself, a skill I had somewhat neglected.I have recommended the course to all my network!
Nice and useful course

This was um first attempt to study online and I chose Cursera for the range of courses offered. I decided to take a simple course on something that I knew about and see how I would perform and test the platform. I was impressed and positively surprised with how many new things I learned and how challenging the course was with the final exam. I am very happy with the overall experience and now I embark in some new challenges with other courses.I do thank the instructors from this program and Cursera for the excellent content and course.

Τhis course was the best idea i had in my attempt to change jobs! It gave me the confidence to pursue what I want. Four days after sending my new crafted CV i had a positive responce from a multinational company.

Thanks to the professors, university staff who put this course. This has changed my entire thinking of how to convert not simply a resume but any report into a pleasant finish.This is a very recommendable course: content is relevant, very useful with real examples and templates to use right away. It shows the professionalism of its creators who know how to effectively communicate in an online course. Go for it!

Excellent course for personal presentation, in regard to, tips for update social media profile, knowledge about info graphic resume, and elevator pitch. This course is must for beginners who are looking for job. The speed is high of first two week lecture. However, subtitle is displaying, which is helping to understand pronunciation. Really helpful, beginner-level course about how to build an effective social media profile and elevator pitch. Also, I really like the concept of an info-graphic resume and I am definitely going to use this in my next job interview.I highly recommend this course to college students who are currently not looking for jobs but wish to get insights into preparing early on for the process.

This is a great course , it really helped me alot to have a good presence online through editing , customizing and fixing my social media  profiles , Specially LinkedIn .The content is so nice , the way the instructors delivered the course is more than professional , the tips they mentioned are all really important ones .I forsure recommend this course to every one .Thank you

This course was very thorough in teaching me how to look professional online, in person, and by resume! I think now with a bit of practice and using these guidelines I will be able come across as holistically professional as I want to.  Much of the information regarding the professional online persona and professional pitch I had no clue about, so I definitely recommend this to everyone!
